summary:
An energetic, open-minded individual with 3+ years experience in the ﬁeld of Quality Assurance, who is always willing to take on challenges and utilize the best of the opportunities. The passion to take responsibilities, seeking new knowledge and strive to win have always been my key strengths.

My experience in software testing in both Manual and Automation areas, while working in the Agile based cross functional environment has provided me with the personal and professional skills necessary to be a valuable addition to your esteemed organization. I am a quality-oriented and an organized person who thrives in challenging, fast-paced environments where my performance directly impacts the bottom line.
